comments:
Description:
Preview attached script report throws error.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report
2. Edit scriptdataset and preview result:
3. Drag the script dataset to layout and preview

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
In step3, errors msg displayed as :

Data (id = 188):
- There are errors evaluating script "row["Num"]".

Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 10 time(s) )
